attributes.action: ensure that the party leader election debates to be held on TV during the forthcoming campaign are all held via free-to-air services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During an election campaign it is essential for the debate to carried to as many voters as possible. The inclusion of the pay TV service Sky as one of the broadcasters showing the debate between the party leaders is not inclusive. It does not entitle people who choose to use free TV services such as Freeview and Freesat to watch. This is entirely inappropriate and steps should be taken to either show this on a free-to-air channel or repeat the broadcast on a free-to-air channel soon after original transmission.

The two other debates will be held on free-to-air TV. All three debates should be treated the same.
